properties.name: 校区-顾问
properties.filterCode: return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {$.getJSON('static/testJson/resourcePool/campusAdviserList.json', function (res) {const [labelCampus, selectCampus, labelAdviser, selectAdviser] = doubleSelectFilter("campus-filter", "所属校区", "adviser-filter", "所属顾问", res.campusAdviserList); $('.resource-pool .show-resource .filters').append(labelCampus, selectCampus, labelAdviser, selectAdviser); resolve();}).fail(function (res) {console.log("err" + res); reject(res);});});

properties.name: 入学年份-类型-学校-学院
properties.filterCode: return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {$.getJSON('static/testJson/resourcePool/schoolCollegeList.json', function (res) {const [labelType, selectType, labelSchool, selectSchool, labelCollege, selectCollege] = tripleSelectFilter("school-type-filter", "学校类型", "school-filter", "所属学校", "college-filter", "所属学院", res.schoolCollegeList); const [labelYear, selectYear] = singleSelectFilter("school-year-filter", "入学年份", res.yearList); $('.resource-pool .show-resource .filters').append(labelYear, selectYear, labelType, selectType, labelSchool, selectSchool, labelCollege, selectCollege); resolve();}).fail(function (res) {console.log("err" + res); reject(res);});});

properties.name: 渠道
properties.filterCode: return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {$.getJSON('static/testJson/resourcePool/channelList.json', function (res) {const [labelChannel1, selectChannel1, labelChannel2, selectChannel2, labelChannel3, selectChannel3] = tripleSelectFilter("first-channel-filter", "一级渠道", "second-channel-filter", "二级渠道", "third-channel-filter", "三级渠道", res.channelList); $('.resource-pool .show-resource .filters').append(labelChannel1, selectChannel1, labelChannel2, selectChannel2, labelChannel3, selectChannel3); resolve();}).fail(function (res) {console.log("err" + res); reject(res);});});
